com.fortify.processrunner.context

Class ContextSpringExpressionUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fortify.processrunner.context.ContextSpringExpressionUtil

  • public class ContextSpringExpressionUtil
extends Object
    This class extends SpringExpressionUtil with methods that allow for storing the Context as a variable in the Spring EvaluationContext.
    Author:
    Ruud Senden TODO Do we still need this, now that (most) on-demand loaders no longer need access to the context?
